column1: LAW (also appearing in the extended form LAWAR) is a Primitive Quendian Sundocarme signifying the golden colour.

column2: lávar ("(golden) blossom"); laurë ("golden colour of sunshine or golden flowers")

column1: In the Qenya Lexicon appear the roots LAURE ("gold") and LAWA ("have life...but used of a vegetable").
In the The Etymologies appears the roots LÁWAR- (Noldorin alteration: GLÁWAR-)
column2: from which derives Primitive Quendian *laurē ("(light of the golden Tree Laurelin) gold the colour
